paper_abstract: We propose an output-sensitive algorithm for the enumeration of all maximal bicliques in a bipartite graph, tailored to the case when the degree distribution in one partite set is very skewed. We accomplish a worst-case bound better than previously known general bounds if, e.g., the degree sequence follows a power law. (c) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Enumerating maximal bicliques in bipartite graphs with favorable degree sequences
